summary: Provides database migration scripts to upgrade application environment data from version 0.10.0 to 0.11.0, introducing a new collection for environment revisions, reshaping existing records to the new schema, and managing image asset links for application variants with forward and rollback capabilities.
business_intent: Maintain data consistency and enable new environment revision features when the backend is upgraded, ensuring seamless transition for existing applications and supporting variant-specific image handling.
